game.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Catapult, Knight, Pikeman

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An entity.
    See Also:

        Launch the entity.
        Parameters:
        action - Action where entity is involved.

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        If the entity is moving: check his next position. If the entity is attacking: attack the target, die if he can't attack anymore. Called at each new turn.

      • receiveAttack

        Remove health point to the entity.
